Headline: No Trains Between Southport and Sedgwick
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Southport and Sedgwick due to an obstruction at Fullerton and Armitage .

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Southport and Sedgwick due to an obstruction at Fullerton and Armitage.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Kimball and Southport, and,
  • between the Sedgwick and the Loop, only.

Shuttle buses are available between Southport and Sedgwick to provide connecting service in both directions

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
